import React, { Component } from "react"; import Swiper from "react-id-swiper"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; class Gallery extends Component { render() { const params = { effect: 'coverflow', grabCursor: true, centeredSlides: true, slidesPerView: 'auto', coverflowEffect: { rotate: 50, stretch: 0, depth: 100, modifier: 1, slideShadows: true }, pagination: { el: '.swiper-pagination' } } return (
); } } export default Gallery;
